author: hwright
msg: Use gnupg.py module to interact with gpg in verifying signatures.
The gnupg.py module is available under the New BSD license from the Google
(grab_sig_ids): Use the module, rather than shelling out to the subprocess

msg: - don't close System.in otherwise it won't be readable anymore

author: stroucki
msg: f10s50switch: add sort of configuration module for force10 network switch. The configuration here is sufficiently different from other switches, so I doubt the existing interface can work with this switch
